GET /api.description: Serves a JSON representation of all the available endpoints of the API

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: Serves a paginated array of all articles, each including a comment_count property. Supports sorting, ordering, filtering by topic, and pagination using 'limit' and 'p' (page) queries. Responds with a total_count property showing the total number of articles matching any filters, regardless of pagination.

queries.topic: Filters articles by a given topic

queries.limit: Limits the number of articles returned per page (default: 10)

queries.p: Specifies the page number to return (default: 1)

articles.title: The Notorious MSG’s Unlikely Formula For Success

GET /api/users.description: Serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves a specific article object for the given article_id, including a comment_count property

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves a paginated array of comments for the given article_id, with the most recent comments first. Supports pagination using 'limit' (number of comments per page, default: 10) and 'p' (page number, default: 1) as query parameters.

queries.limit: Limits the number of comments returned per page (default: 10)

queries.p: Specifies the page number to return (default: 1)
